name: Find Mushi
description:
Mushi is a special little alien. He has the ability to split himself apart and reform himself, which makes him a good candidate for tasks with the other astronauts. Sadly, an accident sent five of his pieces into space! Can you find them all so he can return to normal??

Use WAS to move (No moving backwards, sorry!) and space to shoot. get 5 points to win. Also, there is a glitch that causes your points to say 0 whenever you destroy an asteroid. This is only visual, as the next Mushi you find will return your score to normal. I have no idea why it happens.

Made in the Unity Playground for a school project. Everything but the player character are of my own design.
